inclusion.criterion: Women in the first trimester of pregnancy who sought medical attention at the HMPMP
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: between 16 and 46 years of age with a singleton gestation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: A previously known chronic metabolic disease (diabetes, pregestational dyslipidemia)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis, but is currently not experiencing any symptoms and appears well.
